sections.heading: Overview
content:
A practicing internist for 20 years, Sydney Lou Bonnick, MD, FACP, is a
research professor at the Center for Research on Women's Health at Texas
Women's University. She is the former director of osteoporosis services at the
Cooper Clinic in Dallas.

In 1992 Bonnick was the recipient of the American Medical Women's
Association's Calcium and Nutrition Education Award for her efforts in
physician and public education on osteoporosis. She has made numerous
television appearances, including ABC's "20/20" and CNN.
